headline: Jim Cramer Says Honeywell International Inc. (HON) Is a Buy: “Hold Your Nose and Buy”
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Nailed These 11 Stock Picks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. On Thursday, April 3rd, the host of Mad Money opened the most recent show by addressing the growing concerns […]

headline: HONEYWELL APPOINTS SU PING LU AS GENERAL COUNSEL AND CORPORATE SECRETARY
summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) announced today that Su Ping Lu has been appointed as Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary, effective May 5, 2025. She will succeed Anne Madden who is currently Senior Vice President and General Counsel.
